name: Lifeline
simpleDescription: Marks the ground, and returns you there after a few moments

active.name: Soul Anchor
active.effects: Mark your current location. After 4 seconds, you automatically {{tip|blink}} to the marked location after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay. ''Soul Anchor'' may be recast within its duration to manually blink to the marked location after the same delay (45 second cooldown, starts after the blink).
